examples: A merry crowd gathered around the disconsolate and unbeavered doctor, who watched the gyrations of the flying castor as it slowly felt the force of gravity, and reposed on the bosom of the East River.

entries.meaning: Having the beaver of the helmet open.
examples: […]  To see in sunder shivered the lance that leads the way, / And worthy knights unbeavered in field amidst the fray?
